product_name: Patagonia Drifter A/C Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: Ready for all-terrain exploration, the Patagonia Drifter A/C women's hiking shoes are light, nimble and supportive to keep in step with your adventuresome spirit. Nubuck leather uppers with nylon mesh underlays offer sturdy, flexible performance in a lightweight chassis; padded, bellowed tongue helps keep debris out. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from feet to enhance in-shoe comfort. Anatomically shaped EVA footbeds (20% recycled EVA), offer extra cushioning for all-day wear. EVA midsoles and Air Cushion Plus inserts soak up and dissipate impact shocks. 80% post-consumer recycled polyurethane insole boards distribute pressure, supply midfoot stability on uneven terrain and provide protection underfoot. Vibram(R) Trail Ecostep outsoles on the Patagonia Drifter A/C hiking shoes are made of partially recycled rubber and offer great traction on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: Ready for all-terrain exploration, the Patagonia Drifter A/C women's hiking shoes are light, nimble and supportive to keep in step with your adventuresome spirit.
